trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to and from an object by applying the integer as an index to a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 목록에 인덱스는 정수를 적용 하 여 개체에서 정수를 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AlternationConverter to bind a property to alternating values.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩할 속성 값을 교대로 반복 되는 AlternationConverter를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you do the following: - Create an AlternationConverter and add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어의 항목을 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>에서 다음을 수행 하면에 교대로 반복 되 파랑 및 연한 파란색 배경을,:-는 AlternationConverter 만들고 옆에 파란색 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>및 연한 파랑 <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>를 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: - In a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and assign the converter you created to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -에 <xref:System.Windows.Style>에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>를 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>속성을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>할당 하기 위해 만든 변환기는 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> class.
Converts an integer to an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list.
The integer to use to find an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
The object that is in the position of o modulo the number of items in .
trans-unit.target: 개체의 위치에 있는 o 모듈로 . 의 항목 수

trans-unit.source: Converts an object in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> list to an integer.
The object to find in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values*> property.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
The index of o if it is in , or –1 if o does not exist in .
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 o 에 있으면 <> *>, 또는 o에 존재 하지 않는 경우는-1 <> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 목록을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"> </xref> 정수에 전달 되 면 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to bind a property to alternating values, the Values property contains the objects that are assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>값 속성으로 교대로 반복 되는 값에는 속성을 바인딩할 속성에 할당 된 개체를 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to Values.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어의 항목을 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>추가한 옆에 파란색에 교대로 반복 되 파랑 및 연한 파란색 배경을, <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>및 연한 파랑 <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>값으로.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A list of objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"></xref> returns when an integer is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*> method.
trans-unit.target: 하는 개체 목록입니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter"> </xref> 정수에 전달 되 면 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert*>
